About.content-1: Hey, I am Marek and I am a web developer with experience in both frontend and backend development. In each of these areas, I have worked with various technologies, programming languages and tools. I also have experience with working in a team and agile software development.
About.content-2: I consider myself a reliable and hardworking person who has no problem learning different new and interesting technologies and tools.
About.content-3: In my free time, I enjoy working out, listening to music, watching TV shows, movies, and various sports. I also like reading books and I used to be a huge gamer.
